item.title: Semantic Hotkeys
item.description: Hotkeys are present in nearly all software. However, in my view, both software users and application developers do not realize the full potential of hotkeys. I believe the full productivity of hotkeys can be unleashed through the concept of semantic hoteys. First I’ll introduce some current problems with hotkeys, then I’ll explain how semantic hotkeys can provide a solution. Current Woes The crux of my claims boils down to consistency.
